text: Shaun of the Dead is a 2004 British-French zombie-themed romantic comedy movie. It is set in London. The movie was directed by Edgar Wright, who co- wrote it with Simon Pegg. It stars Pegg and Nick Frost. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2004 comedy movies Category:2004 horror movies Category:British horror movies Category:British romantic comedy movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French horror movies Category:Comedy horror movies Category:Movies set in London Category:Zombie movies Category:British comedy movies Category:2000s apocalyptic movies Category:Movies directed by Edgar Wright
title: Shaun of the Dead
